sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.TechnicalServicesTablesQuery</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>TechnicalServicesTablesQuery</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var TechnicalServicesTablesQuery = Class.create();
TechnicalServicesTablesQuery.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	process: function(){
		var utils = new TableUtils('cmdb_ci');
		var ciList = utils.getTableExtensions().toArray();
		utils = new TableUtils('cmdb_ci_service_auto');
		var serviceList = utils.getAllExtensions().toArray();
		var map = {};
		//mark the classes that we want to remove from list
		for (var i = 0; i < serviceList.length ; i++) {
			map[serviceList[i]] = true;
		}
		// Add cmdb_ci_service and cmdb_ci_service_group to the map of classes that we want to remove
		map['cmdb_ci_service'] = true;
		map['cmdb_ci_service_group'] = true;
		
		//change classes to remove to null
		for(i = 0 ; i < ciList.length ; i++){
			if(map[ciList[i]])
			ciList[i] = null;
		}
		//remove null classes from array
		ciList = ciList.filter(Boolean);
		// Add the query_based_service_basic_view to the array
		ciList.push('query_based_service_basic_view');
		return ciList;
	},

    type: 'TechnicalServicesTablesQuery'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-09-23 14:28:34</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3e376bf5c74400107889759ab8c26027</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>27</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>TechnicalServicesTablesQuery</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Application Service" source="com.snc.cmdb.it_service">72b4cdcf6da620100acb70b353433039</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3e376bf5c74400107889759ab8c26027</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-01-14 09:18:40</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>1045</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
